Incorrect UVs on some faces, fixed in code on export for now.

Some faces, 16 to be specific, wrongly have flag 4 on L111LEV, this doesn't make any real noticeable difference, except from very specific angles.

Main Room = 00

1822, 1896, 1897, 1819		0x2E33E
1823, 1822, 1819, 1820		0x2F3E2
1820, 1819, 1818, 1821		0x2F40A
1821, 1818, 11858, 11859	0x2F432
1815, 1823, 1820, 1811		0x307BA
1811, 1820, 1821, 11847		0x307E2
11847, 1821, 11859, 11856	0x3080A

End Hallway Ceiling

8443, 8442, 8444, 8445		0x2EE92	= 00

Above Door Wall Sides

11555, 11564, 11549, 11565	0x3054E	= 02
11564, 11563, 11548, 11549	0x3053A	= 02
11971, 12055, 11988, 12026	0x391DA	= 02
12055, 12053, 11989, 11988	0x391C6	= 02

11567, 11506, 11566, 11497	0x38D7A	= 00
11506, 11507, 11556, 11566	0x38D66	= 00
12013, 11993, 12054, 11951	0x30936	= 00
11993, 11996, 12052, 12054	0x30922	= 00
